website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a foundation makeup brush that will create the perfect canvas for lipsticks, eye shadows, and more, this is the one to get.
pros: A big brush with soft, dense bristles that gives foundation a flawless finish
Does a good job blending without streaking
Has a thick handle that's made of attractive, sustainable bamboo
cons: This brush is no exception to a common problem – the bristles tend to fall out

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, soft and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This. Brush. Is. Dynamite. THE BEST foundation brush I’ve ever used and blends extremely well! I’ve used it with different foundations and bronzer and it works well for different brands of makeup. So soft and non-abrasive. Well worth the price and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation brush!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super soft. Blends my Tarte foundation great 🤗 Only problem was the packaging came absolutely smashed. So happy it didn’t compromise the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Drea

customer_reviews.title: Super soft brush! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend this foundation brush. Super soft and feel awesome on your skin. Great results!
customer_reviews.author: Peanut_22

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Buy it. Blends foundation like nothing else! I put dabs on my face all over with my hand and then blend with this. It’s amazing. Just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Lane

customer_reviews.title: BEST brush I have ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I was a little skeptical that this brush wouldn't be as good as I have heard. BUT, it's even BETTER! Wow, it is super soft and my liquid foundation goes on so smooth and perfect! I have many other foundation brushes but this is by far the best I have ever used! I am actually going to purchase a second one to have as a backup :) Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting so much! This did not blend my makeup, left lines all over my face and did not bled into my skin. I was using Tarte products that have always blended seamlessly so I know it was not my makeup, it was this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. Shaved off so much time applying my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup tool
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it applies makeup on your face. Uses very little product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love the softness of the brush and the way it applies the mineral foundation. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Busch

customer_reviews.title: A truly great brush, I do recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation brush I’ve ever had. It is so soft, and applies the foundation quickly and evenly. I recommended to my sister, and she has also purchased one. She told me she loves it. This product is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Best brush I own
customer_reviews.text: Best brush I own. Spreads my foundation evenly. Cleans up easily and dries within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best brush I've ever used for liquid foundation application. Love ut
customer_reviews.author: Frie

customer_reviews.title: Gave my makeup a smooth and finished look
customer_reviews.text: Made putting on foundation easy . Loved the look it gave my makeup. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write product reviews but this was the best foundation brush I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter and smaller than my original tarte brush but works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: They sent me a brush that was only about an ...
customer_reviews.text: They sent me a brush that was only about an inch tall. It was not the same brush that is pictured above.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for Zoom video projects
customer_reviews.text: I rarely wear makeup, but with video interviews and composite video projects (virtual choirs, etc.) I decided to raise my game a bit. This is a great brush for whatever you call the stuff you use to even out your facial tones (my wife coached me on that). This works great for application. I ended up rolling up and taping together some cardboard as a sheath for the brush before I put it back in the box and that keeps it in nice condition. If you use it daily, maybe that's not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Bristles come out
customer_reviews.text: This brush was so nightly recommended by the Today Show and by the reviews on Amazon that I was surprised when I used it. It's soft and works well, but every time I use it (every day for weeks), bristles come off. It releases bristles that stay on my face and fall in the sink. I don't know if this is a defective one (I'd love a new one if that is the case). I prefer It brand bushes so much better.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ament

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for full coverage!!
customer_reviews.text: Great brush!! Pat in gently for full coverage! The best brush ever! Covers all dark marks and acne.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Soft and quick application
customer_reviews.text: I looooved this brush. I love how caresses my face when I apply my foundation. It is extremely soft and it feels awesome. And because it's size, the application could be super fast, I take longer because I love how it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Monyflowers

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I bought two.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, one for self tanner and the other for foundation. Works great, but loses hair a little more than I would expect for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: TLN

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush! It's so soft and blends foundation very well. Most brushes soak up too much foundation down in the brush but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I love this brush!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation brush and I’ve used it for a long time. It’s a bit expensive and that’s the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: New Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This brush gives such an even, flawless application. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Flawless application
customer_reviews.text: Using this brush to apply foundation does render an airbrush effect. The downside is that the brush must eventually be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this brush for my amazing girlfriend and she loves it, it was a better deal than at Ulta. Also I got it for her before the price went up.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Good Blending Brush with Soft Bristles!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite foundation brushes! Really easy to clean and spreads the makeup out so well! It’s really hard to use this to blend under eyes and on the nose, but for overall face blending, it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush but I have purchased 2 now and both times, the hairs/fibers became loose and starting pulling out of the brush. Super product until you use it a while and then forget it.... you have a face covered with tiny little fibers...yuck!
customer_reviews.author: william cote

customer_reviews.title: Dense but soft makes for a good foundation brush.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good foundation brush but I still have to use a beauty sponge to smooth out the foundation as it leaves brush strokes on my face. But it is dense but soft which is what I look for in a foundation brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: tarte Airbrush Finish Bamboo Foundation Brush
